item.title: Textverified Chrome Extension Release Announced
item.description: We’re excited to share that our Textverified Chrome Extension has completed its beta phase! After thorough testing and valuable feedback from our amazing users like you, we’re proud to present a polished and reliable extension that’s ready to streamline your verification process. We’ll be releasing the extension officially later this week. What’s new in this update: 1. Verification Functionality Improvements We’ve added the ability for users to reuse a previously verified number to complete another verification.

item.title: Textverified Chrome Extension Improvements
item.description: We’re thrilled to announce that we have some fantastic UI improvements and flow enhancements in the works for our Chrome Extension for Textverified! We have updated the extension to look more like our verification interface on our website. Pricing will start to be shown after you type in the service in the search bar Here’s a sneakpeak of what’s to come: Streamlined Interface: Get ready for a sleeker and more intuitive interface that will make navigating the extension a breeze.
